channel.title: To be the Light - Steve Lemuel
channel.description: Recent content on To be the Light - Steve Lemuel

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Steve Lemuel. Thank you for visiting my site!

I’m a passionate software engineer with many years of professional experience building software and leading teams in both large companies and small startups. I truly love software. I enjoy writing about it as well.
